name: New Relic for AI blurb
input: I need a invite for New Relic AI Observability

referenceOutputs.blurb:
ðŸš€ New Relic AI Observability

We'll be diving into New Relic's approach to AI Observability! In this Tech Radar session, we'll explore how New Relic helps you monitor, troubleshoot, and optimize your AI-powered applications. This includes features for tracking model performance, identifying latency issues, and ensuring the reliability of your AI deployments.

Who should attend:
- Engineers, DevOps, and anyone interested in understanding how to monitor and manage AI applications effectively.

Tech Radar is your monthly dose of the latest tech trends and tools. It's a great opportunity for you to learn from industry leaders and explore technologies to deliver outstanding outcomes for our clients.
